youtube.title: How the Epiglottis Works: Why Food Doesn't Enter Your Lungs
youtube.description: Ever wondered how your body prevents food from going down the wrong pipe? This 3D animation explains the function of the epiglottis during swallowing. Learn the essential anatomy of the digestive and respiratory systems in seconds! Subscribe for more biology facts.
